sentences.en: A high - pressure pneumatic system experimental table was set up.
sentences.cn: 气动汽车走向实用的关键是能量控制系统的合理配置和高效使用.

sentences.en: Building a pneumatic - hybrid car would thus be relatively cheap.
sentences.cn: 因此,制造一辆空气混合动力汽车的花费相对较少.

sentences.en: He rolled up the completed bundle of work and slid it into the pneumatic tube.
sentences.cn: 他把做完的一堆工作卷起来,丢进气动管.

sentences.en: Light kernels may be removed by a pneumatic or air seperator.
sentences.cn: 轻的籽粒可以通过空气动力,即气流分选机清理出来.

sentences.en: Main exports machinery products, welding products and pneumatic products.
sentences.cn: 主要出口机械类产品 、 焊接类产品和气动类产品.

sentences.en: Pneumatic conveying requires comparatively high gas velocities.
sentences.cn: 气力输送需要比较高的气体速度.

sentences.en: Pneumatic DTH ( Down - The - Hole ) hammer is one of main pneumatic percussive - rotary drilling equipments.
sentences.cn: 风动冲击器是气动冲击回转钻进的主要设备之一.

sentences.en: Pneumatic fight lever, simulation machine movement, observe the gear dynamic walking.
sentences.cn: 气动方式打击杠杆, 模拟机器动作, 观察齿轮动态走料的情况.

sentences.en: Pneumatic negative pressure suction machine is only suitable for powder material.
sentences.cn: 气力式负压抽吸机只适合粉状散装物料的卸船.

sentences.en: Pneumatic signals will travel only at sonic speeds.
sentences.cn: 气动信号的传输速度仅仅相当于音速.

sentences.en: Pneumatic valves regulate the pneumatic enforcement agencies and regulatory valves two.
sentences.cn: 气动调节阀由气动执行机构和调节阀两部组成.

sentences.en: The retiring miner pneumatic drill over to his successor.
sentences.cn: 这位即将退休的矿工把风钻移交给他的接班人.

sentences.en: This pneumatic tool will double the speed of assembly.
sentences.cn: 这个气动工具可以把装配速度提高一倍.

sentences.en: We replaced hand picks with pneumatic picks and electric drills.
sentences.cn: 我们把手镐换成风镐和电钻.

sentences.en: Why would a paper company need pneumatic needles with a radioisotope?
sentences.cn: 造纸公司要空气针和放射性同位素干什么?
